TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericUpDownAcceleration extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供信息，指定当按下上移按钮或下移按钮持续指定的时间后应如何对数字显示框（也称为 up-down 控件）执行加速。

span.span: Provides information specifying how acceleration should be performed on a spin box (also known as an up-down control) when the up or down button is pressed for specified time period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用对象 ，以便在通过大量数字递增或递减控件时提供加速。The object is used by the control to optionally provide acceleration when incrementing or decrementing the control through a large quantity of numbers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializeAcceleratedUpDown` 从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理程序调用方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `InitializeAcceleratedUpDown` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 代码运行时，按住上箭头或下箭头以查看加速发生的时间。While the code is running, press and hold the up or down arrow to see the acceleration occur. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#6)]

param.name: seconds
param.span: 加速开始前按下上移按钮或下移按钮的秒数。

span.span: The number of seconds the up or down button is pressed before the acceleration starts.

param.name: increment
param.span: 该控件中显示的值应在加速过程中递增或递减的量。

span.span: The quantity the value displayed in the control should be incremented or decremented during acceleration.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在加速过程中递增或递减显示值的量。

span.span: Gets or sets the quantity to increment or decrement the displayed value during acceleration.

value.span: 要在加速过程中递增或递减显示值的量。

span.span: The quantity to increment or decrement the displayed value during acceleration.
The set value is less than 0.

summary.span: 获取或设置在加速开始前必须按下上移按钮或下移按钮的秒数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of seconds the up or down button must be pressed before the acceleration starts.

value.span: 获取或设置在加速开始前必须按下上移按钮或下移按钮的秒数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of seconds the up or down button must be pressed before the acceleration starts.
The set value is less than 0.
